Wisdom: بَرُّوا أَيْتَامَكُمْ وَوَاسَوْا فُقَرَاءَكُمْ وَارْفُقُوا بِضُعَفَائِكُمْ
enWisdom: Be good to your orphans, help your poor folk and be kind to the weak amongst you

Wisdom: كَافِلُ الْيَتِيمِ وَالْمِسْكِينِ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ مِنَ الْمُكَرَّمِينَ
enWisdom: The one who takes charge of caring for the orphans and the needy is considered [to be] among the honourable ones in the sight of Allah
One who takes charge of caring for the orphans is favoured in the sight of Allah

Wisdom: مَنْ رَعَى الْأَيْتَامَ رُعِيَ فِي بَنِيهِ
enWisdom: Whoever takes care of the orphans, his children will be cared for
One of the best righteous acts is being kind to the orphans
Whoever oppresses an orphan has severed his ties with his children

Wisdom: ظُلْمُ الْيَتَامَى وَالْأَيَامَى يُنْزِلُ النِّقَمَ وَيَسْلُبُ النِّعَمَ أَهْلَهَا
enWisdom: Injustice to orphans and widows brings down divine wrath and takes away the blessings from those who possess them
